verbose_text: A recent report established that high CD38 expression is associated with the presence of t (4; 14) and t (11; 14) in symptomatic and asymptomatic myeloma, respectively, and is correlated with poor survival in AL amyloidosis, but the biological mechanism of these associations remains undetermined.22 It is also known that CD38 expression is not predictive of DARA therapeutic response.23 DARA has been recently tested in several retrospective monocentric studies in patients with relapsed / refractory AL amyloidosis.
